questions.text: The code requirement for “an adequate supply of potable running water” is for _____.
The primary reason for installing backflow prevention assemblies is to _____.

options.text: prevent mixing of hot and cold water
prevent pollution or contamination of the potable water supply

questions.text: Ballcocks in water closet tanks shall be installed so that the critical level of the water inlet is above the full opening of the overflow pipe at least _____.

(choose the answer you think is correct for the minimum height of the atmospheric vacuum breaker critical level above the point specified. ) Above the highest part of a urinal equipped with a flushometer valve: _____

(choose the answer you think is correct for the minimum height of the atmospheric vacuum breaker critical level above the point specified. ) Above the overflow rim of a tank, vat or swimming pool: _____
Above all downstream piping for lawn sprinkler system: _____
PEX tubing shall not be installed within the first _____ of piping connected to a water heater.
Each outlet on a nonpotable water system that is used for special purposes shall be posted _____.

options.text: CAUTION – NONPOTABLE WATER DO NOT DRINK

questions.text: The piping material or materials not approved in the cold water piping located inside a building is _____.
All malleable iron water fittings shall be _____.
Water valves 2-1/2 inches and larger may have bodies that are _____.
Changes in direction of copper tubing may be made with _____.
Water piping systems shall be designed on the basis of the _____.
Copper water tube Type “M” may be installed within a building _____.
Immediately ahead of each water-supplied appliance and each slip joint or appliance supply is required a _____.
After allowing for friction and other pressure losses, the residual water pressure shall be at least _____.
A water piping system with a pressure of 110 psi will require a/an _____.
Any water heater connected to a separate storage tank and having valves between the heater and tank shall be provided with a _____.
Combination temperature and pressure relief valves shall be installed _____.

options.text: based on their listing requirements and the manufacturer’s instructions
within 3 inches to 6 inches of the water heater

questions.text: Galvanized steel piping installed under a concrete floor slab within a building shall _____.
Cast-iron fittings, up to and including two inches in size, when used in connection with potable water piping, shall be _____.
Water piping may be installed in the same trench with less than 12 inches of separation from a building sewer constructed of _____.
The available pressure at the water meter is 80 psi. At the highest supply outlet, 36 feet above the water meter, the pressure would be _____ psi when sizing a water system according to Chapter 6.
Building supplies shall be no smaller than that required for the installation and, in no case, smaller than _____ inch(es).
Copper tubing used for water piping under a concrete slab within a building shall be _____.

options.text: installed with brazed joints with cast brass fittings
installed with Type K copper tube with brazed joints

questions.text: CPVC water pipe may be used for hot and cold water distribution systems _____.
Copper or stainless steel flexible connectors for water heater connectors shall be limited to _____.
Unions shall be installed in a water supply system within 12 inches of _____.
The type of valve required on a building supply to any building is a _____.
All backflow devices or assemblies shall be tested by a _____.

options.text: representative from the Authority Having Jurisdiction

questions.text: Other than systems sized by the use of Table 610. 4, the maximum velocity of a cold water system containing copper and copper alloy tube and fittings shall be limited to _____.
Discharge piping serving a pressure-relief shall be provided with a _____.

options.text: drain that terminates 30 inches or more above grade

questions.text: The quantity of water required to be supplied to every plumbing fixture shall be represented by _____.
The size and material of irrigation water piping installed outside of any building and separated from the potable water supply by means of an approved backflow prevention device is _____.

options.text: regulated by the National Sanitation Foundation
regulated by the American Society of Sanitary Engineers

questions.text: Hard-drawn copper tubing, marked with a blue stripe, is referred to as _____.
The color stripe on Type “K” hard-drawn copper tubing is _____.
Flaring tools are used to make joints for _____.
The distance between a water heater and the union on the waterlines shall not be more than inches.
Whenever fixtures and/or fixture fittings are installed that require a residual water pressure higher than 15 pounds per square inch _____.

options.text: that minimum pressure shall be provided
provisions shall be made to use fixtures that do not require higher residual pressure
the piping system shall be not less than copper tubing Type L

questions.text: _____ water piping systems shall be permitted to be tested with air.
The duration for a water system pressure test shall be for a period of not less than _____ minutes.
In occupancies where plumbing fixtures are installed for _____, hot water shall be required for bathing, washing, laundry, cooking and similar purposes.
Except as required in Section 601. 3. 3,non potable water systems shall have a with black uppercase lettering, with the words “CAUTION: NONPOTABLE WATER, DO NOT DRINK. ”

Plastic materials for _____ piping outside underground shall have an electrically continuous corrosion- resistant blue insulated copper tracer wire or other approved conductor installed adjacent to the piping.
Any water system that prevents dissipation of building pressure back into the water main shall be provided with an approved, listed, and adequately sized _____ or other approved device.
Pipe joint material shall be insoluble in water, nontoxic, and applied _____.

options.text: on pipe threads and inside fittings

questions.text: Surfaces to be joined by soldering or brazing shall be cleaned bright by _____.
Solder and fluxes used in piping systems conveying potable water are prohibited when the lead content exceeds _____ percent.
The minimum wall thickness for threaded plastic pipe (not molded fittings) shall be _____.
When brazing, the alloys shall have a liquid temperature above _____ degrees F.
A push-fit fitting is _____.

options.text: assembled by pushing tube/pipe into the fitting and is sealed with an “O” ring that forms the joint
permitted to be installed in accessible locations only

questions.text: Heat-fusion weld joints _____.

options.text: are used in some thermoplastic systems
require prior approval of an Authority Having Jurisdiction
may be used in drainage systems but not pressure systems

questions.text: _____ systems shall be clearly identified, have a purple background with uppercase yellow lettering.
The area of coverage of a single fire sprinkler shall not exceed _____.
What size drain for the fire sprinkler system shall be provided on the system side of the water distribution shut off valve? _____
Nonmetallic pipe and tubing for fire sprinklers shall be protected from exposure to the occupied space by a material having a minimum fire rating of _____ minutes?
In locations where intermediate temperature sprinklers are required, the minimum distance from a kitchen range top (heat source) is _____.
The minimum separation from a wood burning stove to a fire sprinkler shall be measured in a straight line from the nearest edge of the sprinkler to _____.

options.text: the centerline of the wood burning stove
the nearest edge of the wood burning stove
the far edge of the wood burning stove

questions.text: The sprinkler pipe size from the water supply source to a sprinkler shall not be less than _____ inch.
What is the minimum temperature rating of intermediate temperature fire sprinklers when installed in attics and concealed spaces directly beneath a roof? _____

The water distribution size of the fire sprinkler system in a single-family home has been determined to be 1 inch. The available pressure at the service is 55 psi. The water meter listing specifies a flow rate of 14 gpm. With a water service developed length of 38 feet, the available psi for fire sprinklers is _____.
The minimum water test time for a fire sprinkler system is _____ minutes.
Nonmetallic fire sprinkler pipe shall be certified for residential sprinkler installations and shall have a pressure rating of not less than _____ psi at 120° F.
The water supply for a one story dwelling unit of 1785 square feet shall have the capacity to provide the required flow rate to the sprinklers for a period _____ minutes.
Which of the following is an approved method of protecting the water supply for a chemical dispenser?
A _____ joint is an example of a mechanical joint for CPVC Plastic pipe.
Fittings that employ a quick assembly push fit connector shall comply with _____.
PVC water pipe, that is smaller in diameter than 24 inches that is exposed to direct sunlight shall be protected by a wrap of no less than _____ of an inch to protect the piping from UV degradation.
A type of plastic water piping that may be tested with air is _____.
